IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB AND HARYANA AT CHANDIGARH RFA No.1279 of 1996 Date of Decision: 17.11.2008 Union of India through Secretary

..Appellant. Vs. Gian Singh and others ..Respondents. CORAM: HON'BLE MR.JUSTICE RAKESH KUMAR JAIN Present: Mr.S.K.Sharma, Advocate for the appellant-UOI. None for the respondents. RAKESH KUMAR JAIN, J. For orders see separate detailed order passed in RFA No.1266 of 1996 titled as Union of India through Secretary Vs. Piara Singh. (Rakesh Kumar Jain) .11.2008 Judge Meenu
